meanings.definition: A game similar to hockey, played with a curved stick and a ball or puck.
meanings.sent1: We had fun playing shinney in the park.
meanings.sent2: Kids often gather to play shinney after school.
meanings.sent3: The shinney game got intense as the sun set.
meanings.sent4: In the heat of the shinney match, time seemed to slow down.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the shinney stick hitting the ball echoed through the air.

meanings.sent2: They shinneyed on the frozen pond all afternoon.
meanings.sent3: He tried to shinney with a broom, but it didn't work well.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed as they shinneyed under the clear sky.
meanings.sent5: Shinneying with friends always brings joy to our hearts.

meanings.sent1: He picked up his shinney stick and headed to the game.
meanings.sent2: The old shinney stick had seen many matches.
meanings.sent3: The shiny new shinney stick caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent4: The worn-out shinney stick held sentimental value for him.
meanings.sent5: With his trusty shinney stick in hand, he felt invincible.
